languages.text: {n}Ваш ответ повисает в воздухе, перерастая в напряженную паузу. Кибелла закрывает глаза, делает глубокий вдох и первой нарушает молчание.{/n}
{n}Your response hangs in the air, turning into an uncomfortable pause. Kibellah closes her eyes, takes a deep breath, and finally breaks the silence first.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш ответ повисает в воздухе, перерастая в напряженную паузу. Кибелла закрывает глаза, делает глубокий вдох и первой нарушает молчание.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your response hangs in the air, turning into a tense pause. Kibellah closes her eyes, takes a deep breath, and finally breaks the silence first.{/n}
{n}Your response hangs in the air, turning into a tense pause. Kibellah closes her eyes, takes a deep breath, and finally breaks the silence first.{/n}

{n}Your response hangs in the air, turning into an uncomfortable pause. Kibellah closes her eyes, takes a deep breath, and finally breaks the silence first.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu respuesta no recibe contestación, dando lugar a una pausa incómoda. Kibellah cierra los ojos, respira hondo y rompe por fin el silencio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your response hangs in the air, turning into an uncomfortable pause. Kibellah closes her eyes, takes a deep breath, and finally breaks the silence first.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu respuesta no recibe contestación, dando lugar a una pausa incómoda. Kibellah cierra los ojos, respira hondo y rompe por fin el silencio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの答えは場を沈黙させ、気まずい雰囲気になった。キベラは目を閉じて、深呼吸をすると、やっとのことで喋り始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your response hangs in the air, turning into an uncomfortable pause. Kibellah closes her eyes, takes a deep breath, and finally breaks the silence first.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの答えは場を沈黙させ、気まずい雰囲気になった。キベラは目を閉じて、深呼吸をすると、やっとのことで喋り始めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的答复悬而未决，变成了令人不安的沉默。绮贝菈闭上眼睛，深吸一口气，终于率先打破了沉默。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your response hangs in the air, turning into an uncomfortable pause. Kibellah closes her eyes, takes a deep breath, and finally breaks the silence first.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的答复悬而未决，变成了令人不安的沉默。绮贝菈闭上眼睛，深吸一口气，终于率先打破了沉默。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Antwort hängt in der Luft und schafft eine unangenehme Pause. Kibellah schließt die Augen, atmet tief ein und durchbricht schließlich zuerst die Stille.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your response hangs in the air, turning into an uncomfortable pause. Kibellah closes her eyes, takes a deep breath, and finally breaks the silence first.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Antwort hängt in der Luft und schafft eine unangenehme Pause. Kibellah schließt die Augen, atmet tief ein und durchbricht schließlich zuerst die Stille.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre réponse plane dans l'air et donne lieu à un silence pesant. Kibellah ferme les yeux et inspire profondément avant de se décider à prendre la parole.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your response hangs in the air, turning into an uncomfortable pause. Kibellah closes her eyes, takes a deep breath, and finally breaks the silence first.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre réponse plane dans l'air et donne lieu à un silence pesant. Kibellah ferme les yeux et inspire profondément avant de se décider à prendre la parole.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Verdiğin cevap, havada asılı kalıyor. Ortamı rahatsız edici bir sessizlik sarıyor. Kibellah gözlerini yumuyor, derin bir nefes alıyor ve nihayetinde sessizliği bozuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your response hangs in the air, turning into an uncomfortable pause. Kibellah closes her eyes, takes a deep breath, and finally breaks the silence first.{/n}
